name: ProSystem Emulator v1.3
tagline: ProSystem Emulator v1.3 by Greg Stanton
body:
The ProSystem Emulator is an Atari 7800 emulator for the PC and Windows OS. The emulator was written in C++ using the Windows API and DirectX. It emulates the Atari 7800 NTSC and PAL TV standards.

![](https://github.com/gstanton/ProSystem1_3/blob/master/Web/images/Screenshot1.jpg)

[Prosystem v1.3](https://github.com/gstanton/ProSystem1_3/releases/download/v1.3/ProSystem_1_3.zip)
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
